column5: House with private covered porch overlooking the lake with gas and charcoal grills and smoker. House has large living room, dining room, fully stocked kitchen with granite countertops and dishwasher. Washer/dryer. One bedroom has a king bed with a lake view. Second bedroom has double bed. Third bedroom has two queens and twin bunks. Need more space? The Casita at Lake LBJ is adjacent and offers sleeping for 4.
